useCase.name: User Connect Flow

preconditions.precondition: All actors have access to required systems.

useCase.trigger: User wishes to establish a connection.

mainSequence.step: Inviter creates new connection by sending POST request to Inviter Cloud Agent,
InviterAgent generates a new pairwise Peer DID,
InviterAgent creates a connection state record,
Inviter receives connection record {id, invitation, state},
Inviter packs connection invitation into a QR code,
Inviter sends the invitation to the Invitee using Out-of-band (OOB) mechanism.
Inviter checks the connection state by sending GET request to InviterAgent,
Inviter receives the connection's current state (InvitationGenerated),
Invitee parses the invitation message, reviews, and accepted the invitation,
InviteeAgent receives and accepts the invitation,
